languages.text: Ирлиэт взывает к благоразумию собратьев, однако слова Изгоя не могут заставить их довериться мон-кай — боль утраты переполняет сердца эльдаров. Только что люди уничтожили два судна детей Азуриана, а теперь предлагают помощь? Да еще устами их плененной сестры? Нет. Эльдары не попадутся на эту ловушку.

Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт взывает к благоразумию собратьев, однако слова Изгоя не могут заставить их довериться мон-кай — боль утраты переполняет сердца эльдаров. Только что люди уничтожили два судна детей Азуриана, а теперь предлагают помощь? Да еще устами их плененной сестры? Нет. Эльдары не попадутся на эту ловушку.

Only recently did humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

Only recently did humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特呼吁她的族人做出明智的判断，但她的话并没能说服那些灵族信任猴子。他们的心里充满了失去家园的痛苦。人类才刚刚摧毁了两艘阿苏焉之子的舰船，现在却打算提供援助？更糟糕的是，他们居然还让被囚禁的姐妹之口向他们进行呼吁！不，艾达灵族是不会上当的。
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特呼吁她的族人做出明智的判断，但她的话并没能说服那些灵族信任猴子。他们的心里充满了失去家园的痛苦。人类才刚刚摧毁了两艘阿苏焉之子的舰船，现在却打算提供援助？更糟糕的是，他们居然还让被囚禁的姐妹之口向他们进行呼吁！不，艾达灵族是不会上当的。

languages.text: ユリエットはキンの見識に訴えるが、追放者の言葉ではモン＝ケイのことを信頼させることはできなかった。喪失の痛みがアエルダリの心に溢れる。つい最近、人間はアシュリアンの御子らの船を2隻破壊したばかりなのに、今度は援助を申し出るのか？さらに悪いことに、捕らわれの身の妹の口を通して援助を申し出るのだ！いや、アエルダリはこんな手には乗らない。
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットはキンの見識に訴えるが、追放者の言葉ではモン＝ケイのことを信頼させることはできなかった。喪失の痛みがアエルダリの心に溢れる。つい最近、人間はアシュリアンの御子らの船を2隻破壊したばかりなのに、今度は援助を申し出るのか？さらに悪いことに、捕らわれの身の妹の口を通して援助を申し出るのだ！いや、アエルダリはこんな手には乗らない。

languages.text: Yrliet apela a la sabiduría de los suyos, pero las palabras de la Proscrita no consiguen que confíen en los mon-keigh. El dolor de la pérdida invade los corazones Aeldari. Hace poco que los humanos destruyeron dos naves de los hijos de Asuryan, ¿y ahora ofrecen ayuda? Peor aún, ¡ofrecen ayuda por boca de su hermana cautiva! No. Los Aeldari no caerán en este truco.
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet apela a la sabiduría de los suyos, pero las palabras de la Proscrita no consiguen que confíen en los mon-keigh. El dolor de la pérdida invade los corazones Aeldari. Hace poco que los humanos destruyeron dos naves de los hijos de Asuryan, ¿y ahora ofrecen ayuda? Peor aún, ¡ofrecen ayuda por boca de su hermana cautiva! No. Los Aeldari no caerán en este truco.

languages.text: Yrliet appelliert an die Weisheit ihrer Verwandten, doch die Worte der Ausgestoßenen können sie nicht dazu bringen, Chem-Pan-Sey zu trauen — der Schmerz des Verlusts erfüllt die Herzen der Aeldari. Erst vor kurzem haben die Menschen zwei Schiffe der Kinder von Asuryan zerstört, und nun bieten sie ihre Hilfe an? Schlimmer noch, sie bieten ihre Hilfe durch den Mund einer gefangenen Schwester an! Nein. Auf diesen Trick fallen die Aeldari nicht herein.
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet appelliert an die Weisheit ihrer Verwandten, doch die Worte der Ausgestoßenen können sie nicht dazu bringen, Chem-Pan-Sey zu trauen — der Schmerz des Verlusts erfüllt die Herzen der Aeldari. Erst vor kurzem haben die Menschen zwei Schiffe der Kinder von Asuryan zerstört, und nun bieten sie ihre Hilfe an? Schlimmer noch, sie bieten ihre Hilfe durch den Mund einer gefangenen Schwester an! Nein. Auf diesen Trick fallen die Aeldari nicht herein.

languages.text: Yrliet en appelle au bon sens des siens, mais ce ne sont pas les belles paroles d'une Errante qui les convaincront de faire confiance à des mon-keigh. Le deuil est encore trop frais dans leurs cœurs. Les humains viennent tout juste de détruire deux vaisseaux des enfants d'Asuryan et voilà qu'ils osent leur tendre la main ? Pire encore, ils ont l'audace de passer par l'intermédiaire de leur sœur captive ! Non, les Aeldaris ne tomberont pas dans ce piège grossier.
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet en appelle au bon sens des siens, mais ce ne sont pas les belles paroles d'une Errante qui les convaincront de faire confiance à des mon-keigh. Le deuil est encore trop frais dans leurs cœurs. Les humains viennent tout juste de détruire deux vaisseaux des enfants d'Asuryan et voilà qu'ils osent leur tendre la main ? Pire encore, ils ont l'audace de passer par l'intermédiaire de leur sœur captive ! Non, les Aeldaris ne tomberont pas dans ce piège grossier.

languages.text: Yrliet, halkının bilgeliğine sesleniyor. Gelgelelim Yurtsuz'un sözleri, onları mon-keighlere güvenmeye ikna edemiyor. Aeldarilerin kalpleri, kayıplarının acısı ile doluyor. İnsanlar az önce Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na ait iki gemiyi yok ettiler, şimdi yardım mı teklif ediyorlar? Daha da kötüsü, esir aldıkları soydaşlarını kullanarak yardım teklif ediyorlar! Hayır. Aeldariler bu tuzağa düşmeyecek.
languages.original_text: Yrliet appeals to her kin's wisdom, but the words of the Outcast cannot make them trust mon-keigh — the pain of loss fills the Aeldari hearts. Only recently did the humans destroy two vessels of the Children of Asuryan, and now they offer aid? Worse, they offer aid through the mouth of their captive sister! No. The Aeldari will not fall for this trick.
